annonstext:
At Bannerflow we help designers and companies across the globe create first-class digital advertising that makes an impact - at scale. Our mission is to remove the mystery of digital marketing. With our state-of-the-art SaaS platform, we give our customers full control, enabling them to make top-class advertising in no time.

Our platform is 100 % cloud-based, hosted in Azure, and containerized with Docker. We build our backend with .NET Core/C#, use MongoDB and MS SQL Server as databases and deploy and release without downtime using automated CI/CD pipelines in Azure DevOps. 

Working as a Software Engineer at Bannerflow includes a wide variety of tasks. We plan new features, do investigations and research, do a lot of coding, work in pairs or mobs, review each other's work, write automated tests to ensure high quality, deploy, release and do maintenance and quick bug fixing from time to time. Last but not least, we prioritize having a lot of fun while doing all this together in a welcoming, friendly atmosphere with a lot of laughs and quirkiness.

Each month our platform serves more than 6 billion ads, viewed on 500 million unique devices all over the world. This breaks down to a massive 20 000 requests and 1 GB of data transfer - per second, on average, constantly! To be able to deliver this, we have to stay in the front-line of tech development and always keep up with the latest tools and technologies. Therefore we focus a lot on continuous personal development, learning, and knowledge sharing, for example in all our cross-team forums in which we discuss challenges and findings and share knowledge and experiences. 

We are now looking to strengthen our teams with more great senior backend engineers. If you are a true team player who thrives in cross-team collaboration and have 3+ years of C#/.NET Core experience from previous assignments, then we might be exactly what you are looking for and we would love to hear from you!

Warm Regards, Bannerflow
